DOC.brief_summary: An Open-label extension ( OLE ) , expand access study , assess long-term safety SoluMatrix™ Abiraterone Acetate 500mg ( 4 x 125 mg qd ) Methylprednisolone ( 4mg bid ) patient complete study number CHL-AA-201 .
DOC.brief_title: Extension SoluMatrix TM Abiraterone Acetate Patients Who Completed Study Number CHL-AA-201
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-label extension ( OLE ) , expand access study , assess long-term safety SoluMatrix™ Abiraterone Acetate 500mg ( 4 x 125 mg qd ) Methylprednisolone ( 4mg bid ) patient complete study number CHL-AA-201 . An exploratory endpoint Improved safety switch Zytiga ( aberaterone Acetate 1000mg ( 4 x 250 mg qd ) SoluMatrix™ Abiraterone Acetate 500mg ( 4 x 125 mg qd ) also ascertained..
DOC.criteria: 1 . Written inform consent obtain prior studyrelated procedure perform 2 . Previous , uninterrupted enrollment treatment trial number CHLAA201 . 1 . Progressive disease ascertain investigator use standardofcare evaluation . 2 . CHLAA201 D84 blood count follow : 1 . Absolute neutrophil count > 1500/µL 2 . Platelets > 100,000/µL 3 . Hemoglobin > 9 g/dL 3 . CHLAA201 D84 chemistry value follow : 1 . Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) < 2.5 x Upper Limit Normal ( ULN ) 2 . Total bilirubin < 1.5 x ULN 3 . Creatinine < 1.5 x ULN 4 . Albumin > 3.0 g/dL 5 . Potassium > 3.5 mmol/L
